animeTitle: The Return of the Divine Tycoon
otherNames: The Return of the Divine Tycoon, The Return of the Super Rich, 神豪归来, The Return of the Rich
synopsis: A gentleman's revenge is never too late, even after six years! Six years ago, Ye Hao was framed and imprisoned by his brother's scheme. Now, six years later, Ye Hao returns as a king, vowing to take back everything! Those six years were both torment and a trial for Ye Hao. In the end, through Ye Hao's hard work, his brother was forced to leave the family business, and Ye Hao was chosen as the new leader. He did not choose revenge but instead used fairness and wisdom to lead the family business toward a brighter future.
